title: Free Movie Streaming
description: Website offers "HD movies free" after installing a special codec
rationale: Legitimate sites do not require unknown codecs; risky downloads.

title: Browser Update Prompt
description: A page says your browser is outdated and provides a direct update link
rationale: Updates should come from the browser or vendor

title: Shortened Link Offer
description: Short link promises giveaway; destination is a look‑alike domain

title: Locked Account Page
description: Login page says account locked but URL is slightly misspelled

title: Survey Gift Card
description: Pop‑up survey promises gift card for entering email and password
rationale: Phishing uses rewards to harvest credentials.

title: Extension Required
description: Site requires a new extension with broad permissions

title: Security Warning
description: Mixed content warning appears on login form
rationale: Do not enter credentials on mixed content pages.

title: Verified Vendor Download
description: Official vendor page with HTTPS and signature instructions

title: Bank Page with Padlock
description: HTTPS bank domain with correct URL
rationale: Padlock and verified domain indicate legitimacy.

title: Contest Page
description: Asks for credit card for a free prize
rationale: Phishing often asks for payment for freebies.

title: Fake Support Chat
description: Support chat asks for your account password
rationale: Real support never asks for passwords.

title: Software Mirror
description: Official mirror page with checksums

title: Video Player Error
description: Page requests Flash player installation
rationale: Flash is deprecated and often abused.

title: Redirect Hop
description: Link chains through multiple redirects before login page
rationale: Open redirects are abused for phishing.

title: Security Key Auth
description: Login with hardware key on official domain

title: Wi‑Fi Portal
description: Public Wi‑Fi portal asks only to accept terms
rationale: Typical captive portals ask for simple acceptance.

title: Game Mod Download
description: Downloads executable from forum without signatures

title: Extension Permissions
description: Extension requests "Read and change all data on all websites"

title: Invoice PDF
description: PDF from vendor site with expected checksum

title: Login Overlay
description: Invisible overlay captures clicks on login button

title: QR Code Login
description: QR to login on official site

title: Emoji URL
description: Link uses punycode look‑alike domain

title: Browser Cleanup Tool
description: Random blog offers cleanup tool download

title: Security Headers
description: Site sets HSTS and CSP

title: Passwordless Option
description: Prompts to use passkey on official domain

title: Support Number Spoof
description: Site lists generic support number that asks for OTP
rationale: OTP should not be shared; probable scam.

title: Charity Donation
description: Website asks for gift cards as donations
rationale: Gift cards are red flags for scams.

title: Two‑Factor Prompt
description: Official site requests TOTP after password

title: Email Login Link
description: Magic link arrives from official domain

title: Web Wallet Clone
description: Wallet site looks identical but lives on new TLD

title: Streamer Giveaway
description: External site asks to link your account and enter password

title: Security Scanner
description: Page runs an online scan and demands payment
rationale: Fraudulent scanners pressure users to pay.

title: Certificate Error
description: Browser warns cert invalid
rationale: Do not proceed with invalid certificates.

title: Download with GPG
description: Vendor provides GPG signature

title: In‑App Browser
description: App opens login in untrusted in‑app browser
rationale: May steal credentials via injected scripts.

title: News Paywall
description: Official site requests subscription

title: CAPTCHA Page
description: Legit page uses CAPTCHA to block bots

title: Lottery Tax
description: Site asks tax upfront to claim prize

title: Password Reset Page
description: Official domain with correct TLS

title: Drive‑by Download
description: Autodownload starts without click

title: Fake Wallet Update
description: Wallet site asks to "re‑enter seed" on new domain
rationale: Seed phrase should never be entered on unknown domains.

title: Safe Payment
description: Payment via 3‑D Secure on bank domain

title: Malicious iFrame
description: Hidden iframe loads phishing page

title: Trusted Store Extension
description: Extension from official store with limited permissions

title: Proof‑of‑Payment Upload
description: Site asks to upload card photo

title: Browser Password Check
description: Offers to check passwords against breaches

title: Promo Code Field
description: Legit checkout asks optional promo code

title: Email Attachment Viewer
description: Online viewer asks login for all providers

title: New Domain Alert
description: Brand monitoring flags new look‑alike

title: Official Firmware
description: Router vendor site provides signed firmware
